reference.title: Orientation sensor channel
reference.shortdesc: The orientation sensor channel indicates the orientation of the Symbian device, for example, display up or display down.

section.p: The following table provides information about the orientation sensor channel:

The orientation of a Symbian device is illustrated with six basic orientations as shown in the following figure. In display up and display down orientation the gravitation is along the y-axis. In phone left side up and phone right side up orientation the gravitation is along the x-axis. In display upwards and display downwards orientation the gravitation is along the z-axis.
